item.description:
Sorry for the short notice, but a few of us are heading to Vermont to see what we have been missing.

All of our Vermont rides have only scratched the bottom of this great state, last week Jim & I explored a small section from White Water Junction south on 106, but not before we had to hit the slab and get back.

In order to beat the traffic and get a good head start on the day we will need to leave early as we will have nearly 4 hours before we can get off the highway and enjoy the scenery. So you know that we do stop, the 4 hours includes a couple stops for gas and coffee on the way, and there will be plenty of stops for photos etc. throughout the day.

We will meet at the Hess station in Auburndale at 6AM and ride to meet Jim at 7AM at Dunkin Donuts in Chelmsford on Drum Hill Road, just off Rt 3 at exit 32 MAP

We will be taking Rt 3 north to Rt 89 to Waterbury VT (170 Miles) When we get off we will have roughly 9 hours to get home by sunset, via a combo of highway and backroads.

Weather is expected to be perfect in the 70's all day!
item.name: Vermont Adventure II
